item.title: 人工智能故事未变，降息迫在眉睫，市场转而走高
item.description: Nvidia 公司的财报无论从哪个角度看都令人印象深刻，除了它自己的近况。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s earnings report was impressive by virtually any metric — except its own recent history.】

item.title: 专家小组表示：瑞士必须重新定义传统中立并加强与北约的关系
item.description: 一个独立小组建议，瑞士应深化与北约和欧盟的军事合作，增加军备开支，并重新考虑其不结盟地位。【原文：Switzerland should deepen military cooperation with NATO and the European Union, increase arms spending and rethink its non-aligned status, an independent panel has recommended in what would mark a bold departure from the country’s long-held neutrality.】

item.title: 中国石油巨头描绘头号进口国需求暗淡的前景
item.description:
更多的国内钻井、去碳化和以基础设施为主导的经济增长的结束，都预示着美国的消费前景不容乐观。【原文：

More domestic drilling, decarbonization and the end of infrastructure-led growth bode ill for the nation’s consumption outlook.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩称明年工资增长将显著放缓
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧元区工人的薪酬增长（通胀的主要驱动力）将在2025年和2026年大幅放缓。【原文：Pay growth for workers in the euro zone — a key driver of inflation — will slow sharply in 2025 and 2026, according to European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 芝加哥期权企业家从 IG 股票销售中获利数百万美元
item.description: 汤姆-索斯诺夫（Tom Sosnoff）和斯科特-谢里丹（Scott Sheridan）出售了价值约 6,500 万英镑（8,600 万美元）的 IG Group Holdings Plc 股票，这是他们位于芝加哥的期权交易业务三年前被这家英国公司收购以来的首次大宗抛售。【原文：Tom Sosnoff and Scott Sheridan sold about £65 million ($86 million) worth of IG Group Holdings Plc shares in the first big selldown since their Chicago-based options-trading business was bought by the British firm three years ago.】

item.title: 人工智能贸易动荡，英伟达为过高预期付出代价
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的财报对于这只在过去一年中市值增长近 2 万亿美元的股票来说需要完美。但最终，业绩的大幅增长还是引发了抛售。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s earnings report needed to be perfect for a stock that’s added nearly $2 trillion in market value in the past year. In the end, a broad beat still sparked a selloff.】

item.title: 最受憎恨的信贷交易成对冲基金大赢家
item.description: 去年年底，克里斯-斯坦斯伯里（Chris Stansbury）在华尔街最大的杠杆融资会议之一上发言时，可能是全场最令人讨厌的人。【原文：Chris Stansbury may have been the most hated person in the room as he made the rounds at one of Wall Street’s biggest leveraged finance conferences late last year.】

item.title: 股市提升投资回报，中国人寿利润上升
item.description: 按市场份额计算，中国最大的人寿保险公司中国人寿保险股份有限公司表示，由于股市向好促进了投资回报，上半年利润增长了 11%。【原文：China Life Insurance Co., the nation’s largest life insurer by market share, said profit rose 11% in the first half as an improving stock market boosted investment returns.】

item.title: 欧洲柴油市场亮起红灯，利润率创 15 个月新低
item.description: 衡量欧洲柴油生产盈利能力的一个关键指标是 15 个多月来最弱的，这给炼油厂带来了不利因素。【原文：A key metric for measuring the profitability of making diesel in Europe is at its weakest in more than 15 months, creating a headwind for refiners.】

item.title: 旅游天堂马尔代夫遭惠誉降级，债券低迷加深
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周四下调了岛国马尔代夫的评级，理由是该国违约的风险增加，尽管债券投资者继续抛售该国的债务，但该国的月度表现已是新兴市场中最差的。【原文：Fitch Ratings downgraded the island nation of Maldives on Thursday, citing an increased risk of default, even as bond investors continued to dump the country’s debt that’s already totted up the worst monthly performance in emerging markets.】

item.title: 马航因人手短缺和飞机延误削减运力
item.description: 马来西亚航空公司（Malaysia Airlines）将把整个网络的运力削减 20%，因为该航空公司正努力解决维修人员短缺和新飞机交付延迟的问题。【原文：Malaysia Airlines will cut capacity by 20% across its network as the carrier struggles with a shortage of maintenance staff and delayed deliveries of new aircraft.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。随着市场对英伟达（Nvidia）令人失望的销售预期的淡忘，美国股市有望小幅上涨。现在市场的注意力又转向了宏观前景和数据，这可能预示着美联储下月降息的预期范围。铁矿石的反弹引发了警告。以下是市场正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. US stocks are poised for small gains as markets look past Nvidia’s disappointing sales forecast. Attention is now turning back to the macro outlook and data, which could indicate the scope of the Fed’s expected rate cut next month. And iron ore’s rally prompts a warning. Here’s what markets are talking about. — Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）业绩超出预期，原因是美国写字楼困境缓解，信贷改善
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）的业绩超过了分析师的预期，原因是该行预留了比预期更少的资金来应对可能出现问题的贷款，并表示已解决了其美国办公楼投资组合中的大部分问题。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce beat analyst estimates as it set aside less than expected to cover potentially sour loans and said it had worked through most of the problems in its US office portfolio.】

item.title: 利润下滑，中国银行计划首次中期分红
item.description: 中国银行（Bank of China Ltd.）宣布了自 2006 年上市以来的首次中期股息，尽管该行报告称利润增长乏力。【原文：Bank of China Ltd. announced its first interim dividend since listing in 2006, even as it reported profit growth is faltering.】

item.title: 送货英雄希望在迪拜为中东业务部门 Talabat 首次公开募股
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 希望将其中东业务部门 Talabat 在迪拜证券交易所上市，以从海湾地区的上市热潮中获益。【原文：Delivery Hero SE is looking to list its Middle Eastern unit, Talabat, on the Dubai stock exchange as it seeks to benefit from a rush of offerings in the Gulf.】

item.title: 台湾利用储备金灵活性放松寿险公司外汇管理
item.description: 台湾金融监督委员会正在采取措施减轻寿险公司的外汇套期保值成本负担，由于当地利率与美国利率之间的巨大差距，寿险公司的外汇套期保值成本已经上升。【原文：Taiwan’s Financial Supervisory Commission is taking steps to reduce the burden of life insurers’ foreign-exchange hedging costs, which have risen because of the wide gap between local and US interest rates.】

item.title: IndiGo 的 Gangwal 售出 13 亿美元股份，接近历史新高
item.description: IndiGo 的亿万富翁、联合创始人拉克什-甘瓦尔（Rakesh Gangwal）在该航空公司的运营商 InterGlobe Aviation Ltd. 的股票收盘价创下历史新高后的第二天，出售了价值近 13 亿美元的该公司股票。【原文：The billionaire co-founder of IndiGo, Rakesh Gangwal, sold nearly $1.3 billion worth of shares in the airline’s operator InterGlobe Aviation Ltd. a day after they closed at a record high.】

item.title: 美元广泛走软，中国人民币抹去2024年跌幅
item.description: 由于美联储预计将于下月启动宽松政策周期，市场押注资本将回流中国，因此中国在岸人民币走高，抹去了今年以来的跌幅。【原文：China’s onshore yuan advanced to erase its losses this year on bets capital will flow back to the country, with the Federal Reserve expected to kick-start its policy easing cycle next month.】

item.title: 中国人民银行在财政部非公开拍卖后从市场上购买特别债券
item.description: 中国央行周四从市场上购买了特别国债，预计此举将最大限度地降低政府在私募债展期后突然收紧流动性的可能性。【原文：China’s central bank bought special government bonds from the market on Thursday, in an expected move to minimize the chance of suddenly tighter liquidity after the government rolled over the debt in a private placement.】

item.title: 德国 DAX 指数创历史新高，降息助长乐观情绪
item.description: 德国 DAX 指数创下新纪录，因人们对利率走势持乐观态度，该指数从 8 月早些时候的大跌中反弹。【原文：Germany’s DAX Index hit a new record as it rebounds from a selloff earlier in August amid optimism about the path of interest rates.】

item.title: 印度的高温现在比降雨更能预测粮食价格
item.description: 据汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）称，与经济学家通常依赖的降雨模式相比，跟踪气温上升正成为预测印度粮食通胀的更好方法。【原文：Tracking rising temperatures is becoming a better way of forecasting food inflation in India than the rain patterns economists have typically relied on, according to HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 在凉鞋需求强劲的情况下，Birkenstock 肯定了公司前景
item.description: Birkenstock Holding Plc 公司确认了其 2024 年的财务目标，并公布了强劲的盈利增长，原因是消费者对其高端凉鞋和木屐的抢购愈演愈烈。【原文：Birkenstock Holding Plc affirmed its 2024 financial targets and reported strong earnings growth as consumers snap up more of its high-end sandals and clogs.】

item.title: 欧元区经济信心因工业和服务业而上升
item.description: 由于工业和服务业的改善，欧元区经济信心连续第二个月走高。【原文：Euro-area economic confidence edged higher for a second month thanks to improvements in industry and services.】

item.title: 钱颖一卸任，瑞银任命瑞士信贷资深人士胡晓明为中国区主管
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）任命瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）资深人士胡晓明（Janice Hu）为新的中国区主管，接替在中国工作九年多后决定卸任的钱颖一（Eugene Qian）。【原文：UBS Group AG named Credit Suisse veteran Janice Hu its new head of China to replace Eugene Qian who decided to step down after more than nine years in the country.】

item.title: 中国发现欧盟白兰地存在倾销，但暂不征收关税
item.description: 中国表示，在初步调查中发现了欧洲白兰地制造商倾销的证据，但没有征收关税，这表明中国政府希望与欧盟就管理电动汽车和农业等各种贸易问题进行谈判。【原文：China said it found evidence of dumping by European brandy makers in a preliminary probe but stopped short of levying tariffs, in a sign Beijing wants to negotiate with the European Union in managing various trade issues spanning electric cars to agriculture.】

item.title: Ambani’s Reliance to Consider One-on-One Bonus Share Issue
item.description: Reliance Industries Ltd. said it will consider a bonus issue of shares minutes ahead of the much-anticipated speech to shareholders by its billionaire-chairman Mukesh Ambani.

item.title: Implats Posts Loss as Weak Metal Prices Trigger Asset Writedowns
item.description: Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd. posted a fiscal-year loss after a slump in metal prices prompted the South African miner to write down the value of its assets.

item.title: Pakistan Long-Term Growth Capped by Weak Democracy, Geopolitics
item.description: Pakistan’s economic growth is set to rise gradually in the long run, though the nation’s inability to tackle deeper structural issues like corruption and reduced geopolitical relevance could limit the upside, according to Bloomberg Economics.

item.title: Hyun Song Shin on How Big the Yen Carry Trade Really Is
item.description: Who's doing this trade and why?

item.title: This 2008 Trade Is Back Under a New Name
item.description: Fast-growing “return stacking” exchange-traded funds are offering “portable alpha” layering to the masses.
